name: Frogue Sling
description:
"Bring back peace to Pondlyn, become the FROUGE  and defeat the DestrucToad and his Frogang"

-CONTROLS-

MAC : Click  to Grapple Tongue

ANDROID: Swipe to Grapple Tongue

-ABOUT-

This game / prototype was  made in a month using Unity, all asset are made from scratch and will be on sale shortly.  I'll like to continue expanding it

-TO DO-

This is the List of features i'll be adding bi-monthly

  1.  LEVEL FUNGHOR ( Poison & Shrooms  + Poison)
  2. BAR ( Heals & Buffs) 
  3. LEVEL BOGMIR ( Dark Swamp  + Magic)
  4. MAIN HUB (Settings & Stats)
  5.  LEVEL BARKHAM ( Wood Dead Leaf theme  + Fire)
  6. CHARACTERS & DIALOG
  7.  LEVEL DUNGEON ( King  Crypt  + Undead)
  8. PROGRESSION
  9. QUESTS ( Daily Runs)
  10. MORE COMPLEX LEVELS
-TIPS & TRICKS-

ATTACKING: Try aiming to the sides of the enemy.

COMBOS: Avoid picking all the flies at once, kill enemies before. 

HEALING:  Pick flies
